sentences.en: children infected with the Aids virus
sentences.cn: 感染艾滋病病毒的儿童

sentences.en: Hackers are said to have started a computer virus.
sentences.cn: 据说黑客们已经开始传播一种新的电脑病毒。

sentences.en: He is fully recovered from the virus.
sentences.cn: 感染病毒的他已彻底康复了。

sentences.en: I was determined not to succumb to the virus.
If they have the virus they are putting patients at risk.
sentences.cn: 如果他们有这种病毒，就会将病人置于危险境地。

sentences.en: Liver cancer is linked to the hepatitis B virus.
sentences.cn: 肝癌与乙肝病毒存在关联。

sentences.en: Stewart took over yesterday when Russell was debilitated by a stomach virus.
sentences.cn: 昨天拉塞尔因肠胃病毒感染身体不适，由斯图尔特暂时接手。

sentences.en: The official number of people carrying the AIDS virus is low.
sentences.cn: 艾滋病病毒携带者的官方数字并不高。

sentences.en: The repairman reported back that the computer had a virus.
sentences.cn: 修理工报告说电脑染了病毒。

sentences.en: The virus is getting more and more attention, and not before time.
sentences.cn: 这种病毒正受到越来越多的关注，其实早该如此。

sentences.en: The virus is not passed on through touching or shaking hands.
sentences.cn: 那种病毒不会通过接触或握手传染.

sentences.en: The virus remains dormant in nerve tissue until activated.
sentences.cn: 病毒潜伏于神经组织里直到被激活。

sentences.en: The virus seems to have attacked his throat.
sentences.cn: 病毒看来已经侵蚀到他喉部了。

sentences.en: There is a risk of passing the virus on.
This is the virus in very crude simple diagrammatic form.
sentences.cn: 这是非常粗略简单的图式病毒形态。

sentences.en: This virus infected thousands of computers within days.
sentences.cn: 这种病毒在短短几天内感染了数千台计算机。
